sourcesContent:
export function nightTimeSpeeches(dayNumber:number) {
  return speeches[dayNumber]
}

export function nightTimeLabelTexts(dayNumber:number) {
  return labelTexts[dayNumber]
}

export function nightTimeButtonTexts(dayNumber:number) {
  return buttonTexts[dayNumber]
}

// NIGHT OF DAY 0
const night0Speech1 = ''
const night0Speech2 = '"Mm, ahem, this is a school announcement. It is now 10 p.m. As such, it is officially nighttime. \
Okay then… sweet dreams, everyone! Good night, sleep tight, don\'t let the bed bugs bite…"'
const night0Speech3 = 'Traitors, wake up. Check to see if there are other traitors among the group. I will give you a moment \
to look around. Next, look at the screen. I will reveal to you who the Blackened player is.'
const night0Speech4 = 'To the Blackened player, please also raise your hand or give a signal to let the traitors know who you are. \
I will give a few more moments and then the traitors can go back to sleep.'
const night0Speech5 = 'Traitors, go back to sleep. \
Blackened, wake up. Place the bullet card in front of the player you would like to attack. \
On Night 0, the victim will only lose an item card and will not be killed. \
Press the button below when you are done'
const night0Speech6 = 'U pu pu pu. Blackened - Go back to sleep.'
const night0Speeches = [night0Speech1, night0Speech2, night0Speech3, night0Speech4, night0Speech5, night0Speech6]

const night0LabelText1 = 'Night Time is about to begin'
const night0LabelText2 = 'Everyone go to sleep'
const night0LabelText3 = 'Traitors awaken'
const night0LabelText4 = 'Blackened attack'
const night0LabelTexts = [night0LabelText1, night0LabelText2, night0LabelText3, night0LabelText4]

const night0ButtonText1 = 'Click here to start'
const night0ButtonText2 = ''
const night0ButtonText3 = 'Reveal the Blackened!'
const night0ButtonText4 = 'I am done'
const night0ButtonTexts = [night0ButtonText1, night0ButtonText2, night0ButtonText3, night0ButtonText4]

// NIGHT OF DAY 1
const night1Speeches1 = '"It is now officially nighttime. Please raise your hand if there is something you’d like to do before going to bed" \
\n\n \
Would anybody like to use a night time card?'
const night1Speeches2 = '"Okay then… sweet dreams, everyone! Good night, sleep tight, don\'t let the bed bugs bite…"'
const night1Speeches3 = 'Person 1 - Resolve your item effect. Person 2 - Resolve your item effect…'
const night1Speeches = [night1Speeches1, night1Speeches2, night1Speeches3]

const night1ButtonText1 = 'Click here to enter Item Card. \n\n \
You only need to enter Item Cards that let you investigate someone\'s role at night'
const night1ButtonTexts = [night1ButtonText1]

// AGGREGATE
const speeches = [night0Speeches, night1Speeches]
const buttonTexts = [night0ButtonTexts, night1ButtonTexts]
const labelTexts = [night0LabelTexts]
